name: Bot Rods
description:
Bot Rods is a high adrenaline racing game set in a futuristic world.
The Bot Rods world is inhabited by adorable characters from various species and their equally lovable Bots (legged robot vehicles).

The game is about all out racing and using a trick or two to slow down your opponents , including launching quirky weapons, using power-ups and down right ramming your opponents to slow them down.

Get your family in on the fun. Challenge them to a race in split-screen 2 or 4 player mode.
But watch out . . . What you do unto others can easily be done to you. Play nice or play mean, the finish line is your ultimate goal!

Bot Rods will include the following features by release:
  • Choose between two species and many bots.
  • Have fun with character and Bot customization.
  • Many tracks to choose from.
  • Several offline modes including Campaign, Quick race, Time Trial, Elimination etc.
  • Local Split-Screen with upto 4 players

Bot Rods is best played with a gamepad.
